response.explain: The previous action code successfully moved the robot to the breakfast table. Now, the robot needs to serve the platter with the cooked potato on the breakfast table.
response.subtask:
(1) Move to the fridge
(2) Open the fridge
(3) Take out the potato
(4) Cook the potato
(5) Move to the bottom cabinet
(6) Open the bottom cabinet
(7) Take out the platter
(8) Put the cooked potato on the platter
(9) Move to the breakfast table
(10) Serve the platter with the cooked potato on the breakfast table
response.code:
def act(robot,env,camera):
    # Subtask 10: Serve the platter with the cooked potato on the breakfast table
    platter = registry(env,"platter_92")
    breakfast_table = registry(env,"breakfast_table_idnnmz_0")
    put_ontop(robot, platter, breakfast_table)
    donothing(env)
